Title: Relates to amounts payable under medical assistance
Summary: Relates to amounts payable under medical assistance; insures access to essential health care services and supplies by elderly and disabled individuals who are dually eligible for Medicaid and Medicare.
LawCode: Amd ยง367-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to amounts payable under medical assistance
